headline: Analysts Say Adobe’s (ADBE) AI Tools Are Popular, but Competition Is Intensifying
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the AI Stocks Analysts Are Watching Closely. On January 5, Jefferies downgraded the stock to “Hold” from Buy with a price target of $400, down from $500. While Adobe’s AI tools show adoption and increasing usage, it has had limited monetization amid competition. The rating downgrade comes as part […]
